strategy: Replace the gradient boosting model with a deep neural network (DNN) using a feedforward architecture with 3 hidden layers (128, 64, 32 neurons), ReLU activation, and dropout (20% and 10%) to capture complex, non-linear interactions in the data. Use categorical variables via one-hot encoding with dimensionality reduction via PCA, and apply quantile-based binning for Age and Fare to create smooth, interpretable intervals. Introduce a time-aware embedding for 'Embarked' using a learned categorical embedding layer, and normalize all continuous features with z-score transformation. Train using early stopping on validation loss with a patience of 10 epochs.

import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import StratifiedKFold
